description:
Sauske`s speed and moves are identical to Lee’s Taijutsu. But Gaara is not an opponent who can be defeated with just Taijutsu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Date ni Okureta Wake ja Nai! Kyuukyoku Ougi: Chidori Tanjou!!
Late for the Show, but Ready to Go! The Ultimate Secret Technique Is Born!
วิชาพันปักษา
だてに遅れたわけじゃない! 究極奥義・千鳥誕生!!
